Wants

To find the lost art his mother saw in her dreams.

Tools

Charismatic and creative, he understands people. Can assess honesty, flatter, and intimidate people, especially women and foreigners.

Common Knowledge

You and your father never really saw eye-to-eye. He made you do the Boy Scouts, go hunting, and fence. But you wanted to do art with your Mother at her womens club. After your mother passed from a violent dream, you became intimately close with the women there. You and Bus would often spend the night, not sleeping at all. Some women speak of strange visions your mother had, usually about ancient lost artworks being unearthed in Africa.
